org.daisy.pipeline.tts

Interface TTSInputProcessor


  • public interface TTSInputProcessor
    Prepares an input XML stream for TTS processing. The output is an SSML document that can be passed to a TTSEngine. Objects that implement this interface are expected to also implement SingleInSingleOutXMLTransformer, or a XProcStepProvider that provides SingleInSingleOutXMLTransformer. The language of the input can be specified through a "language" parameter. It should not be assumed that a xml:lang attribute is present when the input is an element.
